alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Addison; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 12:26PM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches for a storm total of 6 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Eastern Clinton, Southeastern St. Lawrence and Southern Franklin Counties. In Vermont, Orleans and Eastern Chittenden Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to near impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most intense snowfall rates will be over the next few hours, before diminishing this evening. Snow will resume later tonight. Downed trees and powerlines are being reports, and scattered to numerous power outages are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
